title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order Gets NEW Content - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.04.20 (Ad-Free+Post-Show)
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about Cal's New Game Plus in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, EA Play's return, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:08:30 - Housekeeping
THE CORE STREAM IS FINALLY HAPPENING! Remember how we were supposed to do a big reveal stream for the fine folks at Core, the game where you whip up your own multiplayer video games, publish them, and play them with the world? Well, the pandemic got in our way, but we’re back on track. THURSDAY at 3 p.m. PT join Greg, Andy, and the developers of Core as they make games and test them out with you. That’s right go download the Core Alpha right now at coregames.com and you can play whatever they create LIVE on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. So, again:
Download Core at CoreGames.com
Come watch and play with us Thursday at 3 p.m. PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Follow @CoreGames on Twitter for updates!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Mohammed Mohammed,Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:30 - Happy Star Wars Day, Jedi Fallen Order gets a new update! - EA.com
00:26:00 - EA Play is happening, June 11th - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:34:29 - Sony's VR Team Is Researching a New Valve Index-Style Controller - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:46:20 - BREAKING: The Last of Us 2 Has Gone Gold
00:51:10 - Japanese entertainment rating organization CERO is resuming operations - KAZUMA HASHIMOTO @ Siliconera
00:58:05 - EVO is cancelled and is moving to an online event - @EVO on Twitter
00:59:11 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
01:00:38 - With xbox having their gameplay showcase thursday do you think there will be any game surprise reveals and/or release date reveal .
Also do you think we will get much on assassins creed Valhalla or just a simple trailer as ubisoft will probably have their own event? - Jacob bowen(psn) - Jacobtdkr
01:02:45 - Squad Up: Alex Price(PS4) - PurEChaoS72
01:03:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:  Blessing and Imran
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
itunes:subtitle: Blessing and Greg talk about Cal's New Game Plus …
